Wartensee railway station () is a railway station in Thal, in the Swiss canton of St. Gallen. It is a station on the Rorschach–Heiden mountain rack railway line of Appenzell Railways.
Services
the following services stop at Wartensee (only on request):
* St. Gallen S-Bahn:
** : hourly service to  via , and to .
